DOC.brief_title: Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor Levels Ectopic Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , observational , single-center study . Ethical approval obtain Institutional Review Board . This study complete 30 patient ectopic pregnancy . An intervenous cannula centrifuge 15 minute 1000 g within 30 minute collection . Aliquots plasma add eppendorf tube store -20°C . Plasma Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor level measure use Human VEGF-A Platinum ELISA kit ( bioscience company , Catalog No : 00122 , Santa Clara , California , USA ) . All assay perform accord manufacturer 's instruction . The test kit sensitivity 2.5 pg/ml . Intracycle variability % 4-6 , intercycle variability % 8-10 .
DOC.criteria: Patients suspect ectopic pregnancy hemodynamically unstable patient healthy pregnancy ( healthy increase ß HCG ) miss abortion incomplete abortion The patient need immediate surgical treatment
